text: Einar Harold Ingman, Jr. (October 6, 1929 - September 9, 2015) was a former United States Army soldier. He is a recipient of the Medal of Honor for his actions in the Korean War. Ingman was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. ==References== ==Other websites== * Einar H. Ingman, Jr. at the Victory Institute Category:1929 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American military personnel of the Korean War Category:People from Milwaukee Category:United States Army Medal of Honor recipients Category:Military people from Wisconsin
title: Einar H. Ingman Jr.
